attributes.action: Ban conversion therapy for transgender people in the uk
attributes.additional_details: I want them to do it as they said they will ban it for gay and bisexual people but not transgender. That's discrimination, lgbt+ includes transgender people. Nobody should be made to sit there and be told that they are the Gender they were born with. Its horrid and should be banned
attributes.background: I would like the government to put a ban on conversion therapy for transgender people in the uk

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

Ban LGBT+ Conversion Therapy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613518
